components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Receipt Delay To Telefonica Network In Mexico

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery receipt delay to Telefonica network in Mexico. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to experience SMS delivery receipt delay to Telefonica network in Mexico. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery receipt delay to Telefonica network in Mexico. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: WA Pricing Affected by Accidental Meta Rollout

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have identified an issue with WA pricing affected by accidental Meta rollout. We expect to provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
Our engineers have identified an issue with WA pricing affected by accidental Meta rollout. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
Our engineers have identified an issue with WA pricing affected by accidental Meta rollout. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
Our engineers have identified an issue with WA pricing affected by accidental Meta rollout. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with WA pricing affected by accidental Meta rollout
. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Vodafone

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Vodafone United Kingdom is conducting a planned maintenance from 28 June 2025 at 13:55 PDT until 28 June 2025 at 20:15 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Vodafone United Kingdom customers.

Impacted Products: Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes, Lookup Identity Match

We are aware of the short notice and are working with our Carrier Partners to provide earlier notification where possible.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in the United States is conducting a planned maintenance from 29 June 2025 at 22:00 PDT until 30 June 2025 at 03:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from United States handsets via United States long codes and short codes.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Multiple Destination Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our Voice carrier partner in Australia and New Zealand is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 30 June 2025 at 07:00 PDT until 02 July 2025 at 12:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be Intermittent delays from and to Twilio Australia and New Zealand phone numbers.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

30 June 2025 at 07:00 PDT until 30 June 2025 at 12:00 PDT
02 July 2025 at 07:00 PDT until 02 July 2025 at 12:00 PDT

scheduled_maintenances.name: Twilio Flex Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Twilio will conduct a planned maintenance on our circuits in the Australia Twilio network from 25 July 2025 at 06:00 PDT until 25 July 2025 at 08:00 PDT. During the maintenance window there could be intermittent impact on the Flex services that rely on the voice calls that are routed through the Twilio’s network in Australia.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Canada Account Security Service Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our service partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 27 June 2025 at 23:00 PDT until 28 June 2025 at 03:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following carriers and country: Rogers Canada, Telus Canada, Bell Canada.

Impacted Products: Lookup Identity Match, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes
